last_episode_to_air.name: Bulletproof
last_episode_to_air.overview: As Deborah works to perfect her second run at Late Night, Ava receives a dream offer, and Jimmy and Kayla seek to grow their company.

name: Hacks
overview: Explore a dark mentorship that forms between Deborah Vance, a legendary Las Vegas comedian, and an entitled, outcast 25-year-old.

seasons.overview: The dark mentorship between legendary Las Vegas comedian Deborah Vance and her young, entitled writer Ava continues to evolve as the two travel across the country workshopping Deborahâ€™s new stand-up act.

episodes.name: There Is No Line
episodes.overview: An entitled young writer and a waning comedy legend must put aside their differences to save their careers.

episodes.name: Primm
episodes.overview: Deborah tests Ava's limits.

episodes.name: A Gig's A Gig
episodes.overview: Ava gains insight into Deborah's past.

episodes.name: D'Jewelry
episodes.overview: At DJ's jewelry expo, Ava comes to better understand Deborah and DJ's complicated mother-daughter relationship. Deborah receives an unexpected piece of ammunition against Marty.

episodes.name: Falling
episodes.overview: Deborah blackmails Marty. Ava has a wild night to remember in Vegas that puts everything in perspective.

episodes.name: New Eyes
episodes.overview: While Deborah recovers from surgery, she and Ava have a unique bonding experience when Deborah dispels a major misperception about her past.

episodes.name: Tunnel of Love
episodes.overview: DJ's birthday party becomes a surprise dual function. Meanwhile, Deborah and Marty reconnect.

episodes.name: 1.69 Million
episodes.overview: With a little encouragement from Ava, Deborahâ€™s unpolished set sparks a career-defining moment.

episodes.name: Interview
episodes.overview: Ava tries to keep a secret from Deborah, but someone in Deborahâ€™s inner-circle leverages the truth. Meanwhile, Deborah stares down the barrel of her first radically honest show.

episodes.name: I Think She Will
episodes.overview: For her final performance at the Palmetto, Deborah must decide between playing it safe and putting her entire career on the line. Meanwhile, Ava deals with a family crisis.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: A dark mentorship forms between Deborah Vance, a legendary Las Vegas comic, and an entitled, outcast 25-year-old comedy writer.

episodes.name: There Will Be Blood
episodes.overview: Deborah eagerly anticipates trying out her new material on the road, while Ava dreads the fallout of an explosive email.

episodes.name: Quid Pro Quo
episodes.overview: Deborah embraces tour life. Ava grapples with the value of honesty. Jimmy learns the harsh realities of Hollywood dealmaking.

episodes.name: Trust the Process
episodes.overview: Deborah continues to workshop her material on the road, as Ava adapts to a new lifestyle. Marcus is overwhelmed by life without Wilson.

episodes.name: The Captain's Wife
episodes.overview: While Deb struggles to connect with her audience on a cruise, Ava finds herself an unexpected hit.

episodes.name: Retired
episodes.overview: An impromptu detour finds Deborah reckoning with long-held guilt while reconnecting with a former comedian friend.

episodes.name: The Click
episodes.overview: A girlsâ€™ night out finds Ava attempting to connect with her mother â€“ and Deborah embracing some unexpected company.

episodes.name: On the Market
episodes.overview: Deborah and her team head to LA to pitch her new set as a comedy special.

episodes.name: The One, The Only
episodes.overview: Deborah prepares to take the stage for her taping as Ava deals with a new opportunity.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: The dark mentorship between legendary Las Vegas comedian Deborah Vance and her young, entitled writer Ava continues to evolve as the two travel across the country workshopping Deborahâ€™s new stand-up act.

episodes.name: Just for Laughs
episodes.overview: As Deborah prepares to accept an award in Montreal, Ava does her best to avoid her former employer.

episodes.name: Better Late
episodes.overview: Deborah and Ava struggle to stay out of one another's orbits â€“ especially when Deborah lands an unexpected opportunity.

episodes.name: The Roast of Deborah Vance
episodes.overview: After learning there's a Late Night vacancy, Deborah makes sure everything â€“ and everyone â€“ is operating at its finest for her roast.

episodes.name: Join the Club
episodes.overview: Deborah is invited to hang with some of her favorite comedians, Jimmy finally lands a general meeting with Winnie, and Marcus recruits Ava for trivia.

episodes.name: One Day
episodes.overview: As Deborah contends with writerâ€™s block and Ava with a broken heart, the pair decide to clear their heads in the woods.

episodes.name: Par for the Course
episodes.overview: Deborah participates in a golf tournament to get face time with the cable affiliates who could decide her future.

episodes.name: The Deborah Vance Christmas Spectacular
episodes.overview: Deborah braces for Kathy's attendance at her Christmas party, while Jimmy and Kayla refuse to call it quits on the comedian's Late Night dreams.

episodes.name: Yes, And
episodes.overview: A calendar mix-up finds Deborah double booked ... just as an unfortunate supercut of her most problematic early jokes starts circulating.

episodes.name: Bulletproof
episodes.overview: As Deborah works to perfect her second run at Late Night, Ava receives a dream offer, and Jimmy and Kayla seek to grow their company.
